text: Hello!  Can anyone confirm if we should still be able to set a workflow enrollment trigger based on `Associated deals` for Company records, or `Associated companies` for Deal records?  It’s not an option for me.  I’ve seen this example showing both both scenarios but it is a year old:  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM/Updating-deal-name-using-automation-can-the-associated-company/m-p/371806/highlight/true#M122104>
